metadata.Title: CVE-2017-11545 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: ** REJECT **  DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: CVE-2017-11543. Reason: This candidate is a duplicate of CVE-2017-11543. Notes: All CVE users should reference CVE-2017-11543 instead of this candidate. All references and descriptions in this candidate have been removed to prevent accidental usage.

criterions.comment: tcpdump package in trusty is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2017-08-17').
